actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that agricultural labor which is subject to Federal Insurance Contribution Act tax withholding shall also be subject to withholding for income tax purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require income tax withholding for certain agricultural employees.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that agricultural labor which is subject to Federal Insurance Contribution Act tax withholding shall also be subject to withholding for income tax purposes.
